value.name: Plaque For NYPD Det. Brian Simonsen Unveiled At 102nd Precinct In Queens
value.description: A plaque was unveiled for Det. Brian Simonsen at the 102nd Precinct in Richmond Hill. The 42-year-old was killed by friendly fire in 2019 while responding to a robbery. During a packed ceremony ...

value.name: NYPD detective killed by friendly fire
value.description: New York City police are investigating the death of detective Brian Simonsen, shot and killed by friendly fire. Officers responded to an apparent armed robbery at a T-Mobile store Tuesday night.
